_header: When this maiden mild and true
_description: Gospel, ‘In vigilia natalis domini’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When þis mayden milde and trewÞe moder of oure lord ihesu…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And wordes þat þe angel saydHe trowed with hert & held hym payd
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum desponsata esset Maria.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: In vigilia natalis domini Euangelium secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 10rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.200-205.
